PHRASE.LANG: No one knows who or what broke her jaw, but she's still the prettiest zombie around![#Legal]
Personne ne sait qui ou quoi a éclaté la mâchoire, mais elle est toujours la plus jolie zombie autour de vous![#Legal]
Niemand weiß, wer oder was brach ihr Unterkiefer, aber sie ist immer noch die schönste Zombie herum![#Legal]
Nessuno sa chi o che cosa ha rotto la mascella, ma è ancora la più bella zombie in giro![#Legal]
Nadie sabe quién o qué se rompió la mandíbula, pero ella sigue siendo la más bonita zombie en todo![#Legal]
No one knows who or what broke her jaw, but she's still the prettiest zombie around![#Legal]
No one knows who or what broke her jaw, but she's still the prettiest zombie around![#Legal]
